nodes.text: Outpost DX-11a was a XQ6 Platform used by the Galactic Empire. It had two squadrons of TIE/LN starfighters.

Imperial defector Commander Zaletta was stationed on this station when Rebel X-wings were sent by the Liberty to locate Zaletta. After destroying the TIE Fighters, and subsequently disabling the station's shields, four Lambda-class T-4a shuttles launched from the station to evacuate the personnel, the last of these was carrying Zaletta. After Zaletta received the rebel's signal and rendezvoused with the Redemption, the X-wings destroyed the station.
